text: hananim-eun mansa-e gwanhan yulbeob-eul seopan-e giloghayeo geuege juni geugeos-eun mansa-e gwanhan gyohun-iyo seol myeong-ila geuligo malsseumhasigil igeos eul gudge jab-a geudaeui baegseongdeullo hayeogeum choeseon-ui geos-eulo ttaleudolog myeonglyeonghala god naega saaghan jadeul-ui geocheoga eotteoham-eul geudaeege boyeoju lila
